item.description:
Greetings All!

We will have our usual lively conversation around the table but also...

The Town of West Hartford has monthly language themes. Back in April we participated in a community-wide celebration of the languages spoken in the homes of West Hartford.  They have proclaimed October German Month!  For this reason, they want to come to our Kaffeeklatsch and put a bit of the German spirit on local TV.

This is a very exciting evening where the West Hartford Community Television will be looking to interview a few native German speakers for a few minutes. (If you don't want to be on camera for TV you do not have to).

We want to create a bit more of the usual German atmosphere (minus the beer!)  We will still be at Panera in the back room with our flags etc.  If anyone has other German decorations,games, souvenirs, bigger flags etc please feel free to bring them, and wear your German shirts!

I might even wear my Trachten!

Bis bald,

Dianne
item.name: Special Kaffeeklatsch- please come!
